Episodes.Title: Miss Polly Had A Dolly
Episodes.Plot: Emma's dolly has taken ill and so The Wiggles call for the doctor! Singing this story makes everyone feel so much better. Add some fun with 'Simon Says' and travelling in the Big Red Car and we're all ready, steady, wiggling!
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Wake Up, Lachy!
Episodes.Plot: Dance and follow the actions with 'Follow the Leader', then point your fingers, do the twist and call out 'Wake Up, Lachy'. Finally, join in with the beautiful singing of 'Twinkle, Twinkle Little Star'.

Episodes.Title: Lachy Shrunk The Wiggles
Episodes.Plot: Lachy's inventions always result in lots of fun and this time he's shrunk Emma and Anthony! Luckily, Lachy has a solution, with even funnier results! Join The Wiggles in the world's catchiest song.

Episodes.Title: The Wiggly Singing Symphony
Episodes.Plot: Simon demonstrates the difference between high and low notes to Dorothy while Emma signs the ABC for the hearing impaired. The Wiggles take to the beach to 'Say the Dance, Do the Dance'!
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Taba Naba
Episodes.Plot: The Wiggles sing 'Taba Naba', a song from the Torres Strait Islands all about having fun at the reef. Emma recites a piggy poem, and we all jump in the Big Red Car to travel through the mountains and the countryside!

Episodes.Title: Wash Your Hands
Episodes.Plot: The Wiggles have all been doing different activities and are about to eat, but what have they forgotten to do? It's time to wash their hands! Emma tells us that she can see clearer now that she wears her glasses.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Spring Has Come
Episodes.Plot: The Wiggles sing a song in Japanese about the coming of Spring. Emma wears a kimono while the other Wiggles wear 'happy coats' for the delightful 'Haru Ga Kita'.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Simon Goes Quackers!
Episodes.Plot: Lachy's inventions always result in fun! This time he makes a drink that turns Simon into a duck. We meet Mumbles the monster, have fun with Anthony's Alphabet and yodel with 'Simon's Cold Water Blues'.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Oozy, Ooey, Allergies
Episodes.Plot: Captain Feathersword plays the musical memory game and then we all learn that some people have allergies through a song. There's numeracy with Wags the Dog, alphabet fun and a song about being safely 'buckled up' in the car.

Episodes.Title: A Lot Of Camelot
Episodes.Plot: The Wiggles are putting on a play and use their director Gregory Griggs! Then it's fun with the alphabet and a dance party with 'Hot Potato', 'The Shimmie Shake' and 'Koala-By'.

Episodes.Title: Tasty Science
Episodes.Plot: Professor Simon teaches Captain Feathersword all about volume with a tasty glass of cranberry juice! Wags learns about numbers by counting bones. Anthony recites a poem about a bee and then has fun with the alphabet.

Episodes.Title: Toot Toot!
Episodes.Plot: The Wiggles dance with Wags the Dog while Emma has a riddle about goats and Simon plays 'Simon Says'. Captain Feathersword recites his pat-a-cake poem and Anthony has fun with the alphabet.

Episodes.Title: Invisible Lachy
Episodes.Plot: Lachy's inventions always result in fun! This time, he becomes invisible, but only for a short time. Anthony has fun with the alphabet while we sing and dance with Dorothy the Dinosaur and do the 'Romp Bomp a Stomp!'.

Episodes.Title: Yummy, Yummy!
Episodes.Plot: Dorothy the Dinosaur does some counting with oranges. Anthony and Simon sing about Michael Finnegan and then begin again! Dance to the 'Bunny Hop' and 'Hot Potato' while Lachy will engage you with his singing lesson.
